sentences: June Tyson (February 5, 1936 â€“ November 24, 1992) was a singer, violinist, and dancer who performed with bandleader Sun Ra.
A native of Albemarle, North Carolina, she worked in Harlem during the 1960s as a singer.
She met pianist Sun Ra and became the only woman in his band, the Arkestra.
She also worked as the band's costume designer, choreographer, and violinist.
She married a member of the crew who designed lighting and sound.
Their home in Harlem became a regular stop for members of the band.
